CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL( clientId__r.Salutation , "02"),"Mr", IF(ISPICKVAL( clientId__r.Salutation , "03"),"Mrs", IF(ISPICKVAL( clientId__r.Salutation , "04"),"Ms", IF(ISPICKVAL( clientId__r.Salutation , "03 & 04"),"Mr & Mrs" , IF(ISPICKVAL( clientId__r.Salutation , "28M"),"Doctor", IF(ISPICKVAL( clientId__r.Salutation , "78"),"Company", IF(ISPICKVAL( clientId__r.Salutation , "SF"),"Sama", IF(ISPICKVAL( clientId__r.Salutation , "SM"),"sama", IF(ISPICKVAL( clientId__r.Salutation , "Mx"),"Mx", IF(ISPICKVAL( clientId__r.Salutation , "Prefer not to say"),"Prefer not to say",null))))))))))
CustomField.label: Civility
